traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.desc: The cat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Aura of Misfortune
traits.desc: Whenever a non-evil creature within 15 feet of the cat makes a skill check, they subtract a d4 from the result. Whenever the cat is killed, the creature that killed it must succeed on a DC 9 Charisma saving throw or by affected by the bane spell for the next 10 minutes.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) slashing damage.
